General.Name: Bumi Benowo Sukses Sejahtera Pt
General.Description: PT Bumi Benowo Sukses Sejahtera Tbk operates as a property development company in Indonesia. It develops and sells warehouses and shophouses. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Surabaya, Indonesia. PT Bumi Benowo Sukses Sejahtera Tbk is a subsidiary of Agung Alam Anugrah Group.
General.Address: Jl. WR Supratman No. 19, Surabaya, Indonesia
